The Administration portlet is packaged in the _ecmadmin.war_ file. The portlet manages the main ECM functions, including categories and tags, content presentation, types of content and advanced configuration.

* *Available preferences* {anchor:id=CONTref.Portlets.Administration.AvailablePreferences}

|| *Preference* || *Type*|| *Default* || *Description* ||
| *repository* | {{String}} | {{Repository}} | The name of the current repository.|


* *Sample Configuration* {anchor:id=CONTref.Portlets.Administration.SampleConfiguration}

{code:xml}
<portlet-preferences>
  <preference>
    <name>repository</name>
    <value>repository</value>
    <read-only>false</read-only>
  </preference>
</portlet-preferences>
{code}
